mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT('KEYWORD_', LPAD(IFNULL((SELECT SUBSTRING(MAX(keyword_id), 10) + 1 FROM user_keyword), 1), 9, '0'))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_keyword (keyword_id, user_id, keyword, created_at) VALUES (#{keywordId}, #{userId}, #{keyword}, NOW())
